website_summaries.verdict: Contains a proprietary blend of superfoods, extracts, probiotics, and amino acids in addition to a complete blend of essential vitamins.
pros: Probiotics and omegas sourced from plants
One pill contains well over 100% RDA of all B vitamins
Blend supports bone, breast, and hormonal health as well
cons: Complaints of pills being hard to swallow

customer_reviews.title: love this brand
customer_reviews.text: repeat buyer. B12 is methylcobalamin, the best form of this vitamin. I'm amazed at how much is packed into this little pill.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of vitamins doesn’t make you feel different but I can tell if I don’t take these I get headaches. I feel like they get absorbed better than most due to the natural form. I’m glad I have these and they work.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Greene

customer_reviews.title: Clean Quality ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife who is very particular and demands quality and natural ingredients. She loves it so it will be our go to for now on!
customer_reviews.author: Normdog85

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: I picked this product for my wife. This is a very basic, safe multivitamin for women. The choices of the forms of the vitamins are fairly well thought out. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Steve

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Naturelo for women for a short period of time BUT I can definitely notice an ENORMOUS difference in the way I feel when I skip a couple of days then resume -- I've noticed a boost in energy, and a general feeling of well being -- I know... Sounds a little dubious but I assure you, it's true! I thought these vitamins were a little pricey but I need the assurance of gluten-free coupled with 'what price health?' (1 star for 'flavor' as there isn't any flavor - Good OR bad) -- I would not hesitate to recommend these vitamins!
customer_reviews.author: Meanne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: First vitamin I have tried that doesn’t make me sick
customer_reviews.author: AGJ

customer_reviews.title: Great, natural, made in the U.S. product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this multi vitamin! Just ordered my third bottle. I am about 6 months into taking it daily, after 2 months I ran out and had a few days before I ordered and received my new bottle. I personally noticed a difference in those days. I have noticed a difference in my hair as well, even my hair dresser said it was longer than normal between my color and cut. Product is natural and made in the U.S. which are 2 things I love in a product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Never saw a proposition 65 California warning before purchasing – angry
customer_reviews.text: I’m angry that there is a proposition 65 California warning on this product that I never saw before I bought it. All I can do is throw it out. That warning should be more prominent, such as having a red text.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss and aching bones
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this product for a month now and its in the trash. I noticed my hips ands knees starting hurting a lot to where my daily exercise was painfully and my hair was falling out in chunks. I thought maybe it was stress or not enough calcium so I decided to read a few more reviews and realized it was the pills. I went from feeling amazing taking my gummy vitamins to feeling like crap on these. Ive switched back to my nature made and urge women not to try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cariglio

customer_reviews.title: Updated review on these vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review - Naturelo contacted me, and confirmed to me that their product contains no lead. They have done independent testing to proove this. The dizziness I had while taking these vitamins could have also been due to me just getting over the flu/post viral illness. Indeed, I would give these vitamins a second chance. Naturelo seems to care about the quality of their products, and their customers. Here is my initial old review. Why do they have a CA-Lead warning? Why is Amazon selling vitamins with lead? Also, I have had dizziness - wonder if it’s because of this product. I will not reorder. Good thing I read the other 1-star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Schilling

customer_reviews.title: No Nausea!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for a year now, and they are just what I need. You only have to take one reasonably sized capsule per day. Because they are made from Whole Foods, they don’t make me nauseous like other daily multivitamins, even when taken on an empty stomach. I take a separate daily calcium supplement along with these, as there isn’t much calcium in them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Grippin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite multi vitamin
customer_reviews.text: This is the best women’s multi I’ve tried. I actually feel and see results on it! And it’s REAL, not full of synthetic vitamins!! Great choice
customer_reviews.author: Ashhhhhh

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Started taking these just for general care and I noticed I do not have terrible cramps during my cycle anymore. Overall, I have more energy too. Very please with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: BDonecker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product again after a hiatus. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer for life
customer_reviews.text: Feel a difference I feel more energetic I will buy for the rest of my life if they still keep making them
customer_reviews.author: Lou Lou

customer_reviews.title: Dosage is balanced.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a multivitamin that provides 100% RDA for each vitamin, not a megadose of some and an inadequate supply of others. Add to this that the present formula is iron-free, as appropriate for older women. I would only wish that minerals such as copper had been left out; but the doses of these are small. Overall, this is the best multi I've found so far.
customer_reviews.author: bklynbky

customer_reviews.title: These Vitamins Are Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are predominantly natural ingredients in this vitamin. Every vitamin I have tried before leaves an aftertaste in my mouth and I "taste them or burp them" throughout the day. Sometimes vitamins make me nauseous. With these vitamins I have no side affects, which is wonderful. I love that they are a capsule. I think that is helpful with preventing the aftertaste, etc. Also, I feel better, with more energy, which is an added bonus! The price may be a little higher, but you are getting a two month supply and a natural vitamin. I just placed and received my second order. I plan to continue to take these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vitamin, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I think Naturelo is an excellent vitamin for women over 50. Good value and has all the ingredients I need in a daily vitamin. I've been taking them for over six months now and I'm very pleased with them. I plan to take them forever! Update: I've been taking this vitamin supplement for over a year now. I think it's the best all natural supplement on the market and I love that it's a once a day capsule.
customer_reviews.author: AuroraGB

customer_reviews.title: These are not good for us
customer_reviews.text: These are not good for us. I bought them because they have methyl-folate instead of folic acid. So far both of my daughters and I can't take these. One of them throws up within 20 seconds of taking it and myself and my other daughter feel sick all day. This is the only multi-vitamin that does this to us. I won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: batman

customer_reviews.title: Severe Headaches
customer_reviews.text: This product has caused me some pretty bad headaches. After I stopped taking them for a couple of days the headaches stopped. I have never had any issues with taking vitamins but this one is just not for me I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: Started experiencing facial flushing, swelling and puffiness, and itchy rash on face and in ears. Was MISERABLE. Also feeling severely fatigued and rundown. Red, blurry, itchy eyes, too. This was the story for almost a full month!!! Doctor and I tried to pinpoint the issue, and I underwent several tests, to no avail. Finally it occurred to me it might be the new vitamin I’ve been taking. I stopped taking this pill daily, and within 3 days the rash on my skin has completely calmed to the point of disappearing, and I feel so much better...more alert and less a feeling of general malaise. Something rotten here my body DID NOT LIKE.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great natural multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a high quality multivitamin that I could take once a day and I certainly found it in this product! I've been taking these vitamins for about a month and the first thing I noticed was my nails growing longer and stronger within two weeks. Then my hair began to feel and look noticeably shinier. I swear it grew two inches already! I will definitely be ordering more and would recommend it to any woman looking for a good once daily multi. Update 11/27/2019- I continue to use this multivitamin and I'm very happy with the results. I have an ongoing subscription to receive it every 3 months from Naturelo. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: PureSweetHell

customer_reviews.title: Too much bloating
customer_reviews.text: After starting the tablet, I felt too bloated. Tummy looked like months pregnant.. Once I stopped the Multivitamin, no more bloating..but return period is already over..Dont know what to do with the tablet..Cant give a 0 rating so gave 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Krithiga

customer_reviews.title: No digestive issues!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I started with the whole food multi vitamin for women, and unfortunately it was a little to strong for my digestive system. I returned that product. In reading some of the reviews I noticed a recommendation for another customer from the company to try this product. I purchased this and it was just the ticket for me. Once a day and no upset stomach or nausea and it has all the essential vitamins, minerals, and organic fruit and vegetable blend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and no side effects
customer_reviews.text: This once a day multivitamin has been great. There is no side effect for my wife and she has improved health benefits from this product. This product is even good for your hair so if you use hair dryers, curling irons, etc this product will be a awesome to take daily to help your hair stay healthy. When you take this product for at least two to three weeks you will notice that you have more energy throughout the day. I certainly would recommend this product to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Bartman

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend this One-a-Day Multi-vitamin for Women.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this vitamin for over a year. It seems to be better quality than the store brands, and it is not produced in China, it is produced in the USA in an FDA-audited facility! One bottle lasts 2 months, so the price is reasonable. My personal doctor likes that this is not a mega-dose of vitamins. I get most of my nutrition from a diet of whole healthy foods, and I take this only as a modest insurance policy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I do not feel good on this Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what is in this vitamin that is causing it? On Paper it looks great. But I do not feel good at all on this vitamin. Seems to flare up all my fatigue and auto immune issues. Crazy. I ordered more than once. Trying something similar in another brand in between. I was feeling better the month in between and when I started taking Naturelo again within a week I started going down hill again. Less energy, more fatigue, dryer skin. Possible increase hair loss? Nails health also affected negatively... Not good
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Throwing it in the trash...
customer_reviews.text: I took this vitamin way longer than I should have, thinking my system just needs to get used to it. NOT!!!! My stomach is constantly upset. I don't dare get too far from a bathroom. I'm tired all of the time. I ache much more than normal. I had such high hopes for this vitamin. I know it's the vitamin, because I was taking MegaFood multivitamin before and I didn't have ANY of these problems. I looked into a different vitamin because of price. Unfortunately, you get what you pay for and I learned my lesson quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle-Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST MULTI FOR MANY REASONS!
customer_reviews.text: This is a superior multi and the only one I've taken for the last 5 years or so. I'm almost 60 and have searched bioavailable multi vitamins. They are available but only at very high doses. I don't need or want that. The high quality ingredients in these vitamins are the reason I keep buying them. Important bioavailable forms of each vitamin, including vit k2 which is also important for not having too much calcium build up in your arteries. I do add additional vitamin D3 but I prefer to do that so I can control how much I take. Love this brand, I trust Naturelo and have been very happy with their product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Lewris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. The rash is real!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this vitamin. I was hopeful that it was going to be great. It has all the natural vitamins and minerals I was looking for. Like other reviews, within two weeks of starting it, I had welted, red hives and an itchy rash across my upper back, shoulders, and neck. I stopped taking it and by day three, my rash was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Wygant

customer_reviews.title: my hair and nails look great and are growing like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after the vitamins I've been using for years had a price hike. They work just as well - no side effects, my hair and nails look great and are growing like crazy. The capsules are a little hard to swallow because of the case, but I know that's the best way to get the nutrition in. I just try to take them with food.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality supplements for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a great quality Whole Foods multivitamin to help supplement my diet but without costing a fortune each month. These have been wonderful! I have been taking this multivitamin for about a year now and I feel so much better when I take these supplements. I can tell a difference when I have forgotten to take them. I’m so glad that I have found this company and highly recommend their products!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have a beast stomach. Tried tons of products and vitamins over the years. Rarely does something take me down. This single handedly did it. I had a headache, felt sick and could barely function. Stopped and the next day was back to myself. I don't know whats in this, but it didn't feel "natural".
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: High quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality natural multivitamins/minerals. For post menopausal women. I like that they're iron-free because there's no constipation. I'll continue using them.
customer_reviews.author: Vic B

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is slipping
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th bottle of Naturelo Womens Iron Free. I have like the product from the very beginning. My choice is for a high quality, organic, complete vitamin in an easy to swallow, small tablet. However, the last two bottles including the one I received yesterday have at least capsule in the bottle that's been punctured thereby spilling contents throughout the bottle. It's very messy and leaves me feeling concerned about the packaging and quality control processes in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lou C

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if its a coincidence or not but I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if its a coincidence or not but I've been feeling bloated and was a little nauseous .On top of this I have noticed these dry patches, one on my leg and on my hand, appears to be hives. I may be having an allergic reaction to these vitamins. Its awful because I thought they would be all natural, and prevent any reactions from happening but I was so wrong. Just be careful and read all ingredients before you purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is no "one size fits all.."
customer_reviews.text: For me, the product is just average. I will see after several weeks. I like that the product is in a gel cap. I can easily swallow it...that's the first hurdle. The second is its absorbability. I also like that many of the ingredients are claimed to be organic. A description of "natural" can mean very little. The reputation of a company can mean a lot when the reviews are good so I will be looking at that. What is important to me is if the supplement looks like it actually contains what the label says. It's an indication that the product has been minimally processed. This looks like a white powder...which could be almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Like the Vitamin, But 3 Empty Capsules in the 60 Count Bottle So Far...
customer_reviews.text: Like the ingredients, easy to stomach especially compared to other vitamins, no adverse reactions but no noticeable positive effects either. Overall great but minus one star because so far I have come across 3 empty capsules in my 60 count bottle!! I didn't take a photo of the first one since I assumed there would only be one, but then I came across another (took photo), and then another (next photo)....and I still have like half the bottle left! Makes me concerned about quality control...which creates doubt about the consistency of the vitamins themselves and who is overseeing the final product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mold in vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both take these vitamins, and I’m on my second order of men’s and women’s bottles. I was really liking them, however this new bottle is a bad batch! Capsules are full of little black spots. After reading other reviews, it appears this is mold?! My first bottle of this vitamin had an all white capsule, but this new batch is definitely contaminated!! Updated to add: my husbands new bottle also had mold!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: If you want to keep your hair do not buy these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I was feeling run down and needed a vitamin to take. I’ve been taking it for about a month and I have felt so much better and clearer Mind but I stopped because my hair IS SO THIN now, it’s thinning! I have never had this problem. This is absolutely disgusting, how can they sell this crap!!? My mom noticed my hair thinning:, and let’s face it moms know when something is off with us. I’m 30 and my mom can still notice subtle changes in my appearance. Anyways I just want to write this to help others. If you want to keep your hair PASS on this “natural” vitamin. In Search of another multivitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Hellothere4

customer_reviews.title: What the hell!?????
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews..... Smh... the picture explains itself. I just can’t believe that I have been digesting these pills a with this inside. I threw away the rest of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: india

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to trying these vitamins, it was a challenge for me to find a reasonably priced daily vitamin with minerals that was also soy-free. Simply one of the best multivitamins I have ever taken - I love that I can meet my daily requirement for vitamins and minerals with one capsule that also happens to be free of soy, preservatives or artificial coloring and/or flavoring. GREAT price for a two month supply! It's also worth mentioning that the customer service for this company is top notch - I emailed them with a question and they responded promptly. All in all, I am very satisfied with this product and this company's service.
customer_reviews.author: NE

customer_reviews.title: I feel good when I take these
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that these vitamins really are whole food based like they say they are. I have been tricked by other companies who used that label but I read the ingredients and the vitamins were all cultured in lab media! I feel the difference. These do not upset my stomach. Thanks for quality product. Looking forward to trying the gummy next - I am always way more regular about taking vitamins if they are in gummy form.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana L

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I just received & started taking these- Seem good so far! No digestive upset. I found that they are highly touted & recommended by different professionals online (why I bought them). I also just bought their children's chewable vitamins for my daughter to try. I'll update my review after a few months of taking them. Great seller too!
customer_reviews.author: NatalieF

customer_reviews.title: It's A Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: How do you really know if a vitamin works or not. Because of my current health issues, I've started putting it in my daily protein smoothie. I don't have any aftertaste so I guess that's a good thing. And I haven't had any type of reaction to it - that I know of.
customer_reviews.author: ElyLibrarySec @AudiobookObsession

customer_reviews.title: BEST vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried other natural whole food vitamins that were more expensive and these are the only ones we order now. After researching, these are better than the more expensive brand we were purchasing. Easy to digest and great value.
customer_reviews.author: MajesticMountain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect one a day vitamin with no folic acid
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for a long time to find a multivitamin that doesn't have folic acid and still is reasonably priced. These are perfect. I only have to take one a day which was surprisingly hard to find. These are easy to swallow capsules that don't have any taste and I have never had any stomach problems taking these. I now have them on automatic delivery. I highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Anita L. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins
customer_reviews.text: As a person with the MTHFR gene mutation, finding good vitamins with no synthetic additives is very important to me. These have everything I need at an affordable price. I plan to continue using Naturelo products for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: reviewsbyerin

customer_reviews.title: Great multi vitamin
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best one a day multi vitamin I have come across. It has the best forms of vitamins and minerals that the body needs and there is no magnesium stearate. I don’t have any issues with upset stomach either. I take one every night before bed! Will continue to buy as long as everything remains the same!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Charles

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a few months and am happy with them. The only vitamins I’ve taken that don’t give me stomachs cramps.
customer_reviews.author: April Davies

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on a daily multivitamin and this was the best, most cost effective one I found! I've been taking it for a couple weeks and the stomach problems and pains I used to have, have gone away since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vitamin, and how easy it is on my stomach. I suffer from stomach lining issues, and I’ve noticed some vitamins tend to aggravate those issues. I’m happy to say, these do not! I take them every day, with no side effects whatsoever. They are extremely easy to swallow (compared to the horse size pills I’ve had in the past), and I always take them with breakfast and a full glass of water. Extremely happy, and will be purchasing more when I’m running low!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product in Every Way!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hard time finding multi-vitamin pills that don't have iron. Also, most pills/capsules are huge and I have difficulty swallowing them. These capsules slide down my throat and love that they are all natural. You also cannot beat the price for two months! Second time ordering and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Lady NI

customer_reviews.title: Naturello is excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only multivitamins that I can take, I have had gastric bypass surgery almost 5 years ago, all other vitamins made me very sick especially the other bigger brand names or big pharmacy chains store brand all make me very sick. Naturello is excellent!!!!! Yes, excellent; since I have altered my gastrointestinal system its the only multivitamins I can now take on an empty stomach or pouch before eating a meal or just before eating a meal and guess what? I don't get sick at all, NOPE not sick at all. Love it.... from someone who have had gastric bypass and need to take multivitamins since I do have a malabsorption issue.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal.H

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking daily for like three weeks now and I haven’t had and bad side effects. But also haven’t noticed anything improve? I just needed a daily vitamin, taste bad at first but goes away after a couple min. I’ve taken it with and without food and never had any stomach issues. First time taking daily vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Edith G

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be working for me
customer_reviews.text: I always take it in the beginning or middle of my meal to avoid it getting stuck in my throat (I hate taking pills). But the food helps to push it down. It seems to be giving me good results. I had white specks in my fingernails, that have seem to go away after a few weeks of taking these. I never feel nauseated after consumption. My hair seem to be improving and my skinnies not nearly as dry as it was.
customer_reviews.author: jy

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I found this vitamin on a list of worst and best multivitamins. It contains folate instead of folic acid, which is better for those who have the MTHFR gene variant. The ingredients are organic, and is one of the high quality one a day multivitamins recommended for those on a budget. The article recommends you may need additional vitamin a, in your diet, or in the form of true vitamin a (vitamin a palmitate), since beta carotene is not as good of a form of vitamin a.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi B

customer_reviews.title: i wanted to like this brand but the amount for b vitamins
customer_reviews.text: the dosage of each individual vitamins is too low. i wanted to like this brand but the amount for b vitamins, for example, is not potent enough. i would mainly use this for iodine.
customer_reviews.author: slykramon

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins
customer_reviews.text: This is the first vitamin I’ve found that didn’t upset my stomach and it has done wonders for my overall health and immune system
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This product provides 100% of the recommended vitamins and minerals. I've research other brands and many list 3,333% of a given vitamin. You can always supplement the specific vitamin or mineral you require. The company also sends you information regarding the contents, etc. which I found helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Louise B

customer_reviews.title: Great for Those Who Need Methyl-B12 and Methylfolate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multivitamin. I've been taking it for at least 1.5 years. Since I have a MTHFR gene and my body cannot utilize synthetic B12 (cyanocobalamin) or folic acid, I need methylcobalamin and methylfolate, which this multivitamin contains. For those who don't have the gene or don't know, you can still take this vitamin. It is the reduced form of those, meaning, it has been broken down so that the body can easily utilize. So many other companies want to charge an arm and a leg for this, but Naturelo has a fair price and you only need to take one per day. 60 capsules=2 months. 120 capsules=4 months. Naturelo makes both of those sizes.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had terrible stomach pain with this vitamin. Gave it a try for two weeks. Stopped the vitamin and pain went away. Maybe too much iron.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Good one a day multi
customer_reviews.text: A multi vitamin I can take without any stomach issues. I’ve been looking for a while now for a vitamin that would not make me sick. These work fine without all the stomach problems multi vitamins usually give me
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say how impressed I am with the Naturelo brand. I have been terribly anemic for years and have tried all sorts of multi-vitamins with Iron, but my body just was not absorbing the iron probably until I tried the Naturelo multi-vitamin. It is the only one that has helped me reach and maintain proper iron levels. I have also recently tried the B-vitamin complex and have so much energy now! This is now the only brand of vitamins that I trust and know actually work. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Expected more
customer_reviews.text: I have not noticed any difference in my energy levels, which was what I was hoping for. Would not purchase again will go back to the over the counter brand I was using before with better results.
customer_reviews.author: Missy M

customer_reviews.title: Naturelo Multivitamins
customer_reviews.text: I like these and have been using them for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Buyer

customer_reviews.title: omg i LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: i saw all the bad reviews and was hesitant about buying this but yall are just haters fr. im anemic and vegan and its very hard for me to find a vegan multivitamin that wont hurt my stomach and this one doesnt hurt me!! and i used to get bruises all over my legs due to anemia and now i dont get bruises! this multivitamin is my holy grail. definitely recommend for everyone. ESPECIALLY for vegans w iron issues.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful with this product, i bought it 2 months ago. First day I took it my body started itching, I couldn't sleep for 3 days, I stop the vitamins, and i completely forgot about i the side effects. 7 days ago my mom found the vitamins and we started taking it again, my mom's skin broke up on her cheeks and sideburns, itchy neck, dry mouth and sleepin problems, I started breaking out on my sideburns, chest and neck, my whole body itch, I can't sleep, my cheeks itch.. What's the problem? What is in the pill that is causing people those reactions. I'm very disappointed, I just put it on the trash. Be-carful please
customer_reviews.author: james karasiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this vitamin-mineral supplement. Taking one a day appeals to me, as well as the fact that they consist of natural (as opposed to chemical) ingredients. The company also kept me informed when regulations were changed regarding labeling, explaining in detail.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P

customer_reviews.title: Horrible outcome
customer_reviews.text: I’m a nurse and in lieu off recent events I’ve decided to take my vitamins more rigorously and daily. Since then I’ve felt a loss of a significant amount of hair. Both on my brush and in the shower. It would come out in lumps. Understandably we all lose hair everyday, but this is not normal. I’m not an expert on vitamins and I don’t claim to be, however these results are not healthy. I threw the remainder in the trash and will look for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Hoa

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the vitamins daily for about a month and I swear I have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Only one a day!
customer_reviews.text: I’m reading liking this product. It’s hard to find multivitamins with natural ingredients that don’t require you to take four pills a day. I’m really impressed they use magnesium citrate which is impossible to find in multivitamins. That’s the best kind of magnesium for your body to consume. Also, I love how the percentage for the vitamins aren’t “3000%” or some strange over the top number. This is giving me great energy! I’m glad I purchased it. The only thing is the multivitamins look different in person. They’re white but that’s about it. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the hairloss
customer_reviews.text: This product made my hair fall out in large chunks! I took it for about a month and noticed my hair falling out. I came back here to find out other women were having the same issue! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bloats!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t figure out why I gained weight and felt bloated all the time, I stopped taking this vitamin for a couple days and I lost a couple pounds and lost the bloat! I should note that I took as directed and I drink over 8 glasses of water a day.
customer_reviews.author: Forever shopping

customer_reviews.title: Increased energy and stamina
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality multi vitamin, easy to swallow capsules, excellent price. I have noticed an increase in energy and stamina since I started taking this multi vitamin every day, I have not experienced any stomach discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product for the Mature Woman
customer_reviews.text: 2 Fit Docs on YouTube recommended this product NATURELO. What I like about this multivitamin it's easy to digest, no repeat. The advertising is truthful it's a supplement not a miracle pill. I will definitely reorder NATURELO.
customer_reviews.author: Geri T

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: It’s great to have find a multivitamin that doesn’t contain filler, calories or toxic chemicals. This multivitamin has almost everything I need based on my age. I just had to buy an additional 200mg of magnesium and 900 mg of calcium to get my daily value. I love that I only have to take one pill and not three or four. I wish this company made just calcium alone that doesn’t contain vitamin D or zinc.
customer_reviews.author: aimee andrade

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin for us 50+ women
customer_reviews.text: The capsules are easy to swallow. I like that they have no preservatives, coloring, flavoring, GMOs, soy, or gluten in them. They are a vegetarian capsule and I find they digest easily. No stomach upset, even if I take one without food- Not that I recommend that.
customer_reviews.author: KarCar

customer_reviews.title: Eczema Beware
customer_reviews.text: I have mild eczema and I’ve been really good with controlling it with diet. I seen this and because it’s all organic loved the idea and thought I would try, it’s been 10 days now and I’m itchy everywhere and my legs ankles and feet have broken out and this is the only thing I have changed, I went back through the reviews and seen this has happened to others. Please beware it can trigger itchy skin and rash for sensitive skin. I really loved the idea but unfortunately need to stop taking it. Update, the company reached out to me to apologize for the reaction and was very professional about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Natural nutrients are great!
customer_reviews.text: As a senior, my stomach has lost most of its ability to metabolize and convert most synthetic vitamins and some forms of other needed nutrients. So I have been deficient for a long time in most nutrients. This product has naturally sourced vitamins etc and I've noticed a real difference in my lab tests for type 2 diabetes and CKD since I began taking. My doctor recommended I take 2 per day, and I had an immediate improvement in kidney function, so I'm using a bottle a month. Cheap compared to paying for additional prescriptions...
customer_reviews.author: Japanese Chin lover

customer_reviews.title: Phosphorus amount is not the same on label
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using these vitamins for about a week so I neither like or dislike them because it is too early for my complete review. However I did notice that the image online shows that it has 60 mg (5%)) phosphorus but on my bottle it has 8mg (1%) DV phosphorus. 🤔 Although a small difference it just makes me feel a bit duped and leaves me to wonder about the quality and standard of these vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: shay

customer_reviews.title: Try dissolving it in water
customer_reviews.text: This multivitamin looks great with all the right ingredients. I have been taking it for a few months and just decided to test it by soaking it in water. If it's good, it should have dissolved in 30 minutes, leaving a powdery residue. I'm very disappointed. Several hours later, the capsule had not dissolved. I wish I'd tested it sooner so that I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the stomach!
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost 60 years old and have NEVER been able to "stomach" (literally) a multivitamin. After about 2 weeks of continuous use, I would get such bad pains that I would have to stop using the vitamins. I've now ordered my second batch of these vitamins and so far so good. This is the longest I've gone on a multivitamin!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Cali

customer_reviews.title: Methyl vitamins aren’t for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I think the methyl b vitamins do not agree with me. I took these for about a week, felt good, and then started to have chest pain, anxiety, and too much energy. I couldn’t sleep at night. It is taking a while to wear off, unfortunately, but if I am going to take these, I’ll take them once per month. I liked that they have iron and they are easy on my stomach...but not at the cost of losing my mind.
customer_reviews.author: meme33

customer_reviews.title: Choked me and almost immediate stomach upset
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a high nutrient multi to supplement vitamin D and Iron. Took one and within an hour I was seriously sick to my stomach. I don't consider myself to have a sensitive digestion. Returning and won't buy this brand again. And then when I tried to return it they sent me another bottle instead and now it's being hard to return the second order. Definitely a poor experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamins I've taken
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are amazing quality for the price. I've tried so many including expensive monthly brands like Ritual. None have worked like these. All other expensive vegan brand have hurt my stomach, and usually require taking multiple pills. These are great at only having to take one a day, and no digestive issues. It took a few weeks of taking them daily to notice a difference in how I was feeling, but gradually I just started feeling MUCH BETTER. I have more energy throughout the day , brighter and smoother skin, and my hair has been growing really fast. I stopped taking them briefly and really noticed the difference. I started feeling sluggish and just not good.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Mor

customer_reviews.title: Expired Vitamins Make You Sick - NOT COOL!
customer_reviews.text: Got these May 12, 2020, took them for 35 days, was ill twice during this time and started to look at possibilities. Narrowed it down to these vitamins as being the only addition to my otherwise healthy life. Turns out I’ve been taking EXPIRED vitamins for 35 days! Expire date was Feb 28, 2020! NOT COOL. Last time I will order anything consumables from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rose

customer_reviews.title: They have been great for me
customer_reviews.text: This will be my second purchase of the Naturelo vitamins. They have been great for me. I take them in the morning and they provide me with energy to get through my work day. I like that I only need to take one a day. I also like the price. In comparison to other multi-vitamins, Naturelo is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Good Vitamin Supplement
customer_reviews.text: This is not a supplement that gives you huge mega doses of each vitamin. It generally gives you the DV or less, which I like. The one thing I did not like is that you are instructed to eat a meal and drink a full glass of water when you take the capsule, and I really don't want to have to drink a full glass of water each time. I didn't notice this when I ordered it. If I had I may have ordered something else.
customer_reviews.author: Slingshot

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Better Every Day
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and convenient product. Everything my wife needs in one tablet and all in the right amounts. Plus she loves that there are no GMO, no soy, and no gluten. Makes a difference because everywhere else you look soy is in everything and no one else is dedicated enough to make sure there's no gluten. Allergies are tough. But not here! Great product. Really making a difference. Thank you Naturelo for making such a thorough, complete and perfectly balanced product!
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Daily Multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I decided at 35 it was finally time to take a daily multivitamin. I'm vegetarian and always a little low in B, D, and Iron, so I was looking for something to check those boxes in a sufficient quality with only one a day. Loved the look of the ingredients, and was not disappointed! The biggest difference I've noticed is that my finger and toe nails are so strong and healthy now (after about 2 months of vitamins). My whole life they've been thin and fragile, to the point where I didn't need to cut them, they'd just break when they get a little long, so it's an exciting change.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bantelman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow. makes me feel great.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I chose this. This is a top rated vitamin. This is my second bottle. My PREVIOUS vitamins had such a bad smell (not expired) that I could not bear to open the jar, let alone take one out and put it in my mouth. With these however, there is no smell. I can tell these are quality by the way I feel!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The contents of the capsules are the color of rice bran. This is the first food based vitamin that i have encountered that looks like this. If it contains carrots kale, pomegranate etc, i expected some color . In Garden of life, Mega Foods, Costco brands , one can see, smell or taste the the vegetables and fruits. I am very disappointed. Update: The company was very prompt in addressing my concerns. They claim that the high content of magnesium and calcium account for the color. I checked reviews elsewhere on the web and the product is highly rated so I am waiting to see how I feel and my test results.
customer_reviews.author: Vijaya Mackrandilal

customer_reviews.title: Best multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I checked the ratings on these vitamins before ordering and they are rated high. I feel like my health has improved since starting them over a year ago. I also have my husband taking them since the only difference in men's and women's is the lack of iron in the men's. Besides being a great product, the customer service is good also. I ordered the wrong vitamin the last time and was able to return them immediately for a refund. We have now added Naturello Vitamin C to our regimen. Great Company, Great Products!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Preston

customer_reviews.title: All natural and organic :)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to finish these vitamins before giving an honest review. This is my 2nd purchase as I did not have a negative experience the first time. I recommend taking this with a glass of water and some food so it digests easier. I like the all natural ingredients. ** Note: It's possible that the people who have experienced negative effects either got a bad batch or even mixed them with current medications that caused a reaction. I recommend talking to your doctor before taking ANY vitamins and make sure it doesn't interfere with your meds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leads to Facial Flushing/Numbness
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked - I took this ONCE and it made my face start to flush/tingle/slightly numb. It’s been over 18 hours since I took it, and I still feel it. I doubted it was due to a multivitamin, but I thought about all I ate and drank and if there any new products I used the past 24 hours, and it boiled down to this “vitamin”. Do NOT take this!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Boosts Immune System!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this vitamin for a little over a month now. I took it consistently, but then missed taking it for 3 days in a row. I then got sick with a stomach bug, immediately followed by a cold. As soon as I started taking these again, I immediately noticed a difference in how I felt within 24 hours - my cold virtually disappeared, and the night before I had been absolutely miserable and congested. I can't say for sure it was these vitamins that caused this chain of events, but it doesn't seem like a coincidence to me. Will definitely be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: digestion and breakdown and effect of multi
customer_reviews.text: caused indigestion and bloating , I did finish product and had bought 2 , i am sure for others it works, not me. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Terry Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I tried many different vitamins before finding one that actually helped with my health and issues I needed to address. Now my whole family takes Naturelo vitamins. Each of us has one that is tailored directly for our needs. Could not be more satisfied with this product. Plus, the pricing is amazing. Especially considering I was a health product retailer and have tried and sold other health products. Nothing compares to these.
customer_reviews.author: brinicky

customer_reviews.title: I like that these vitamins are natural
customer_reviews.text: I like that these vitamins are natural. I'm not sure if I feel a huge difference but I am under a lot of family stress right now. I joked with my husband and told him his eyes might get better....today he actually read a menu without his reading glasses for the first time in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Patty H
